name: Alberts Share Accomodation
description:
Albert's, in the heart of North Queensland, offers you a relaxed tropical vibe and many great facilities from an outdoor BBQ area to a fully air conditioned indoor recreation area.

With shared, affordable accommodation featuring secure card access to the premises and rooms, the hostel also provides personal charging stations and lockers in each room. On-site coin operated washing machines and dryers are also available.  The hostel also provides a modern commercial kitchen and free Wi-Fi.

Albert's friendly and welcoming atmosphere will make you feel right at home during your stay.

houseRules.notes:
Hotel Policies

1. Check-In and Check-Out
- Check-In Time: 2:00 PM
- Check-Out Time: 10:00 AM
- Early check-in and late check-out are subject to availability and may incur additional charges.

2. Reservation and Cancellation
- Reservation Policy: A valid credit card is required to secure your booking.
- Cancellation Policy: Cancellations made 24 hours prior to the check-in date will not incur any charges. Cancellations made within 24 hours of check-in will be charged the first night's stay.

3. Payment
- Accepted Payment Methods: Cash, credit cards (Visa, MasterCard), and debit cards.
- Full payment is required at the time of check-in.

4. House Rules
- No Smoking Smoking is strictly prohibited inside the hostel premises. Designated smoking areas are available outside.
- Quiet Hours: Please respect other guests by keeping noise to a minimum between 10:00 PM and 7:00 AM.
- Pets: Pets are not allowed in the hostel.

. Security
- Key Card Access: Guests will be provided with a key card for secure access to the hostel and their rooms.
- Personal Belongings: The hostel is not responsible for any lost or stolen items. Please use the lockers provided in each room.

6. Damage and Liability
- Guests are responsible for any damage caused to the property during their stay. Charges may apply for any damages or missing items.

7. Guest Conduct
- Guests are expected to behave in a respectful and considerate manner towards other guests and staff. Any disruptive behavior may result in eviction without a refund.

8. Health and Safety
- Emergency Procedures: In case of an emergency, please follow the instructions provided by the hostel staff.
- Cleanliness: Guests are expected to maintain cleanliness in shared spaces and their rooms.

For any specific inquiries or additional information, please contact us.
